Row.Text: Adds toggles for showing/hiding civ borders and city borders. City borders show which tile belongs to which city, for cities close to each other.
Borush96, F1rstDan, Gusjeon, iBlockZer0, leonardify, Somchai2548 and Webrok for localizations. And you, if you would provide a translation for Portuguese :-)
This should be compatible with all other updated mods.
